valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 29 Jan 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Fri 30 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Atlantic low moving rapidly northeast expected Sole 974 by midday tomorrow. New low expected north Shannon 973 by same time
